resources.string: Include the switch log in the mail.
The widget lets you access CPU tuner function quickly from your home screen.
CPU tuner widget is not enabled.
The widget cannot be added since the widget extention is not installed
Based on the battery level quite a few triggers are used to control the CPU. No service switches are activated.
The CPU is only controlled based on the state of the device regardless of the battery level. No service switches.
This is the profile described by D. in his blog (http://linux-tipps.blogspot.com/2010/12/make-your-android-power-efficient-in.html) without mobile data switching.
This is (nearly) the old default configuration. It is similar to Sophisticated, but uses much more rigorous setting. While battery saving is better the performance gets worse.
